title: Some nice East LA Graffiti Art
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162754im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fp042907-41_4070.jpg)

Taken last Saturday in an alley near where the I-5 and 710 intersect.

author: fontplayer

comments.content: That’s an impressive work of art.
